
## Examples using builtin datasets

### Using `mtcars` dataset

```{r}
cont_table(varlist = c("mpg", "wt"), data = mtcars)
```

### palmerpenguins package and the penguins dataset

```{r}
library(palmerpenguins)
cont_table(varlist = c("bill_length_mm", 
                       "body_mass_g"), 
           data = penguins)
```
